snippet: The CBS drama's 200th episode had a huge total audience of 20.8 million viewers on Tuesday night. Yes, nearly 15 million of those viewers were over 50, but the 5.3 million in a younger demographic were enough to carry the night.
abstract: The CBS drama's 200th episode had a huge total audience of 20.8 million viewers on Tuesday night. Yes, nearly 15 million of those viewers were over 50, but the 5.3 million in a younger demographic were enough to carry the night.
lead_paragraph: CBS has every reason to celebrate the 200th episode of its long-running hit drama, "NCIS," and not only because it put an exclamation point on the anniversary by performing as the standout show in every way Tuesday night.

headline.main: Tops Among Older Viewers, 'NCIS' Can Still Draw Younger Ones
